snippet: Whatever trouble Richie Incognito encountered — and there were numerous scrapes with the law, with coaches and with teammates — there was always a football team that wanted him.
abstract: Richie Incognito, who was suspended by Miami Dolphins amid allegations that he bullied teammate Jonathan Martin, may have been acting on some level in response to his own childhood riddled with teasing.

byline.contributor: Karen Crouse, Ken Belson and Greg Bishop contributed reporting, and Alain Delaqueriere contributed research.Karen Crouse, Ken Belson and Greg Bishop contributed reporting, and Alain Delaqueriere contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Whatever trouble Richie Incognito encountered — and there were numerous scrapes with the law, with coaches and with teammates — there was always a football team that wanted him.

headline.main: Prized for His Aggression, Incognito Struggled to Stay in Bounds
headline.print_headline: Player Prized for Aggression Struggled to Stay in Bounds
